org.mundo.rt
Class MessageContext

java.lang.Object
  org.mundo.rt.MessageContext

public class MessageContext
extends java.lang.Object

MessageContext objects provide additional information about how a Message has been published.

Author:
Erwin Aitenbichler
See Also:
IReceiver

          The channel a message has been published to.

public Channel channel
The channel a message has been published to.

public Publisher publisher

Number of times the message has been dispatched.
